channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Digital technology diffusion in the age of AI - Cross-country evidence from microdata
item.description: Digital technology diffusion in the age of AI - Cross-country evidence from microdata by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 22 January 2026 at 0:01.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Artificial intelligence and local debt - Evidence from five OECD bond markets
item.description: Artificial intelligence and local debt - Evidence from five OECD bond markets by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Monday 26 January 2026 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Colombia 2026
item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Colombia 2026 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 28 January 2026 at 16:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Croatia 2026
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Croatia 2026 by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 30 January 2026 at 10:00.

item.title: Exploring possible AI trajectories through 2030
item.description: Exploring possible AI trajectories through 2030 by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Tuesday 3 February 2026 at 6:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Delivering High Value Cancer Care - European Cancer Inequalities Registry Analytical Report
item.description: Delivering High Value Cancer Care - European Cancer Inequalities Registry Analytical Report by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 4 February 2026 at 9:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Bulgaria 2026
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Bulgaria 2026 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 5 February 2026 at 9:00.

item.title: Education and Skills in Peru
item.description: Education and Skills in Peru by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday 24 February 2026 at 0:00.

item.title: Financial Protection Against Catastrophic Risks - Floods, Fires and Other Major Risks
item.description: Financial Protection Against Catastrophic Risks - Floods, Fires and Other Major Risks by Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 5 March 2026 at 7:00.
